name: Left Hook Liam v0.2-alpha
description:
Left Hook Liam is a fast-paced FPS focused on fluid movement with a grappling hook and a rocket launcher.

This version contains a tutorial, 4 short levels and a boss fight. Help Liam become the fastest hook lad and defeat GODOTRON.

I made this in two weeks using the Godot game engine.

You can reach me at bernard.p.cloutier@gmail.com
